title: Full length group portrait of Stanton -Taylor wedding party, from left, first row: Alice Batch, Jean Nelson Harvey, Eva Stanton, bride Marian Stanton Taylor, groom Edward Victor Taylor, Romaine Denning Lyons, Elsie Stanton Cobb, Helen Douglass Bolden, and Betty Brady; second row: P.L. Prattis, Robert R. Taylor, Dr. Joseph Robinson, Samuel Milai, and Atty. Wendell Stanton, posed in grass with building in background, possibly home of Mr. and Mrs. John Stanton
medium: black and white: Agfa Safety Film
